name: DINNERSAURS
description:
This arcade game is meant to be played in the dinosaur section of a museum! This is a play on George Olsen's initial hypothesis on what the oviraptor behaved like when he first found the fossil, which was an "egg-stealing thief". Play as an oviraptor, steal eggs, and throw them at approaching predators' mouths so they don't eat you!

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, SHIFT to sprint, C to sneak, click & hold egg to collect, click & hold to throw egg

NOTE: This is half-finished, so many mechanics and the map are missing :)

Background music (temporary): Tostarena: Ruins - Super Mario Odyssey [OST]
